item.title: the food diaries
item.description: Pan Fried Momos @ The Blue Poppy, Calcutta. June, 2012.White Sauce Pasta @ Chai Break, Calcutta. July, 2012.Chowmien @ Kalika Restaurant(roadside), Calcutta. June, 2012.Wheat Beer @ The Biere Club, Bangalore. December, 2012.Margherita Pizza @ Caff√© Pascucci, Bangalore. December, 2012.Risotto @ Afraa, Calcutta. June, 2012.Jhaal Muri @ Paritosh's Place, Manipal. October, 2012.Draught Beer @ Afraa, Calcutta. July, 2012.Onion Uttapam @ Woodlands, Udupi. November, 2012.Chocolate Brownie @ Bliss, Bangalore. December, 2012.The Food Diaries.
